channel.title: Courses on S. Adhikary
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on S. Adhikary

item.title: Cryptology
item.description: This course introduces students to the basic concepts of cryptology.

item.title: CS628: Computer Systems Security
item.description: This course introduces students to the cyber security threats, mitigation methods and revisions of standards based on cyber threats.

item.title: ESC111A: Fundamentals of Computing - I (Tutor)
item.description: This course introduces students to the basics of programming, using C as the language of instruction.
